_notes: Each unit has 'lines': an array of strings.
- 1 line:  shown once, sits until mode change or click re-rolls.
- N lines: sequences through all lines, then auto-picks a new unit.
modes:  which render modes suit this unit. Omit or 'any' for universal.
themes: semantic tags for optional filtering.
interval: ms between lines in a multi-line unit (default 4000).
